channel.title: Make your own music and post it here!
channel.description: We don't have a thread like this yet so yea, the title explains it all. What i used to make the song? Ableton Live and a VST Plugin called Massive. If anyone's interested in making their own electronic music, i can make you guys a tutorial. Anywho: http://soundcloud.com/greenandredrocker/droplet-the-truth EDIT: Heavier bassline here: http://soundcloud.com/greenandredrocker/droplet-we-are-anonymous

item.title: Make your own music and post it here!

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

Oh a downtempo track im working on, Check it. Any criticism encouraged. http://soundcloud.com/greenandredrocker/droplet-motion

Read full topic

item.title: Make your own music and post it here!
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

Atomic, i like that last song, but i think you should use a scale so it doesn’t sound off tune. And the tracks lack sub level bass, which makes the sound more full. Not picking on you or anything, you have some really cool ideas.

Oh and an old DnBish song:

Read full topic

Kinda old. My Nexus plugin stopped working, so I can’t exactly improve on it now (I never realized how much I loved that Analog Brass )[/quote]That’s pretty awesome, though at some points there was alot going on. You should add some drums and bass instruments too.
